episodes.title: Cult Confessions: Bethany Joy Lenz Tells All | Episode 314
episodes.description: Bethany Joy Lenz spent a decade in a cult—now, she’s revealing the shocking truths she uncovered, the mind games that kept her trapped, and the lessons that changed her forever. In this episode, she opens up about manipulation, control, and the road to freedom and what Jesus teaches all of us through it.
